string-array.name: berlin_descriptions
string-array.item: Restored 18th-century gate and landmark with 12 Doric columns topped by a classical goddess statue.
Neo-Renaissance parliament building topped by a Norman Foster glass dome with 360-degree city views.
2,711 columns forming a vast mazelike Holocaust memorial, with an underground exhibition room.
Majestic 1800s cathedral with an organ with 7,000 pipes, plus royal tombs and a dome for city views.

string-array.item: City-center square and transport hub with towering St. Peters church, 2 town halls and a toy museum.
A 200-hectare palace estate with a rococo interiors, coach display and symmetrical baroque gardens.
Expansive, 18th-century, urban park with 78km of cycling/jogging trails and a lakeside beer garden
Museum complex in an old royal residence Palace, buildings and gardens housing state-owned museums.

string-array.item: Grand Gothic cathedral with twin spires Landmark Gothic cathedral with a huge facade, plus guided tours.

The formerly private collection of Peter Ludwig, with paintings, ceramics, sketches and prints.
Popular theme park with roller coasters and other thrill rides, plus stage shows and accommodations.

The Ilz is a river running through the Bavarian Forest, Germany.
